articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Cambodian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Cambodian Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with outgoing Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Chhorn Hay at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulation to Thai King
articles.content:
Congratulation to Thai King
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Thai King Bhumibol Adulyadej on the occasion of his birthday and the national day of Thailand. 
					 The message wished the king good health and happiness and the Thailand people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greeting to Thai PM
articles.content:
Greeting to Thai PM
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Thai Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra on the occasion of the national day of Thailand.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will further strengthen and develop, wishing the prime minister success in his responsible work for the steady development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Thursday sent a similar message to Surapong Towijakchaikul, deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs of Thailand.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Refutes S. Korean Regime's Talk about "Interference in Internal Affairs"
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Refutes S. Korean Regime's Talk about "Interference in Internal Affairs" 
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The anti-"government" actions launched by south Korean people of all social standings against the hideous fraudulent election held with government power involved are rapidly gaining in scope and strength to be a struggle participated in by political parties, organizations and religious circles.
					 Public organizations of the DPRK, international bodies and organizations and many countries of the world are extending positive support and solidarity to the south Korean people in their actions.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group, driven into a tight corner, is resorting to crafty moves to mislead public opinion by describing the DPRK's support and encouragement as "interference in its internal affairs" in a bid to escape public criticism at home and abroad and tide over its crisis.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1055 on Thursday in denunciation of these moves. 
					
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 South Koreans' bitter denunciation of the election rigging and actions demanding the resignation of Park Geun Hye is an eruption of curses and resentment of the public at the puppet conservative group that seized power through all sorts of high-handed practices and by illegal methods.
					
					 Such being a hard fact, the puppet group is brutally suppressing south Korean people, claiming that their actions were conducted at someone's "instruction" and in pursuance of "propaganda offensive of the north against the south". This is an unbearable insult to the just struggle of the south Korean people and an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The group is loudly trumpeting about someone's "interference in internal affairs" but it is none other than this group which is meddling in internal affairs, in actuality.
					
					 Its sophism about "interference in internal affairs" is nothing but a cynical ploy to justify the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" and calm down the daily surging struggle of south Korean people. 
					
					 The DPRK will never allow the racket kicked up by them under the pretext of "its instruction" and brutal suppression of the south Korean people for justice and democracy but continue to support the righteous struggle of south Koreans as compatriots. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group should face judgment by history as unanimously demanded by south Korean people of all social standings and public at home and abroad, before talking about the "interference in internal affairs," a fiction.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Leaves for Pakistan
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Leaves for Pakistan
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK headed by Vice-Chairman Kim Wan Su left here on Thursday to take part in the Sixth Asian Parliamentary Assembly to be held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Participants in Great Workshop on Construction Arrive
articles.content:
Participants in Great Workshop on Construction Arrive
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Participants in the great workshop for people in the field of construction arrived here on Thursday.
					 They include personnel of units for architectural designing, construction, building materials and supervision and those of armed organs and the fields of science, technology and universities related to construction and officials of local party organs and administrative bodies.
					
					 They were greeted by Kim Ki Nam, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol and officials concerned of the party and armed organs at Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 Pyongyangites and students warmly welcomed the participants who performed exploits in construction sites.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Military Attache
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Military Attache
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Juan Miguel Garcia Montano, military attache of the Cuban embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday on the occasion of the 57th Day of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba.
					 Present there on invitation were generals and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy were on hand.

articles.title: National Agro Sci-tech Show, Presentation Held
articles.content:
National Show, Presentation of Agro Sci-tech Achievements Held
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The 2013 national show and presentation of the achievements in agricultural science and technology took place at the Academy of Agricultural Science from Dec. 3 to 5.
					 The show and presentation were divided into the panels of grain crop breeding and cultivation, plant protection and agro-chemistry, soil fertilizer, industrial crops, fruit growing, sericulture, vegetable cultivation and veterinary science and animal husbandry.
					
					 On display there were at least 100 sci-tech achievements made by scientists, technicians and teachers of the research institutes and educational institutions in the field of agriculture and more than 200 exhibits of at least 80 kinds including grain crops of new species and mixed herbicide.
					
					 The participants swapped achievements and experience gained in the work for boosting agricultural production and developing agricultural science and technology onto a higher stage.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony on Thursday were officials concerned and scientists, technicians and teachers of the research institutes and educational institutions in the field of agriculture.
					
					 More than 30 research papers were highly appreciated by the participants for their practical significance including paddy rice of new species, apple cultivation technology and achievements made in increasing yield of potato and bean.
					
					 Certificates and prizes were given to the successful participants.

articles.title: Ardent Yearning for Kim Jong Il Runs Higher in DPRK
articles.content:
Ardent Yearning for Kim Jong Il Runs Higher in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Workers of the light industrial sector in the DPRK are working hard to fulfill their yearly production quotas with ardent yearning for leader Kim Jong Il, who dedicated all his life to the improvement of the people's livelihood, with the approach of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Workers of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill are effecting a fresh upsurge in cloth production, determined to carry out Kim Jong Il's behests to the letter.
					
					 It was in May Juche 100 (2011) that Kim Jong Il visited the mill. 
					
					 Looking round varieties of goods made of Tetron rayon fabrics, he called for boosting the production of quality cloth to meet the taste of the people.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, when visiting the mill in October this year, said the mill takes a big share in improving the standard of people's living and indicated the tasks to be fulfilled by the mill.
					
					 He personally selected a site for the mill's hostel and settled all problems concerning the construction.
					
					 Min Il Hong, manager of the mill, told KCNA:
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un showed the same loving care for the weavers as leader Kim Jong Il did. 
					
					 The employees of the mill are determined to make a qualitative and quantitative growth of production as expected by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The mill is now making every effort to update its production processes.
					
					 Yearning for Kim Jong Il also serves as an incentive to increase the production in the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory.
					
					 Ri Sung Hui, manager of the factory, said;
					
					 When visiting the factory in December 2010, Kim Jong Il, satisfied to see the products, underscored the need to mass-produce quality hosiery. His sunny smile will be always remembered by all the employees of the factory who unanimously turn out in increasing the production to carry out his behests at any cost.
					
					 Production upsurge has also been witnessed at the Hamhung Knitwear Factory, Manpho Spinning Mill and other light industrial factories.

articles.title: DPRK Bags 150-odd Gold Medals in Int'l Games This Year
articles.content:
DPRK Bags 150-odd Gold Medals in Int'l Games This Year
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has bagged more than 370 medals in 70-odd international games this year.
					 Among them are 150-odd gold medals, which mean an increase of 3.6 times the figure of last year.
					
					 Its sportspersons showed their indomitable spirit and fortitude in every international tournament, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's intention to turn the country into a sports power.
					
					 The DPRK women's football team won the 2013 East Asian Cup, bringing a great joy to the local people celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War (July 27).
					
					 In this regard FIFA through its website praised the DPRK team as the strongest in East Asia. And China's Beijing Daily said in an article that the DPRK sportspersons have a strong sense of obligation to their country and have made utmost efforts in the games to show the strength of the DPRK, startling the world people.
					
					 DPRK weightlifter Om Yun Chol set a new world record with a lift of 169 kg in clean-and-jerk at the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship held here.
					
					 Paddlers Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong came first in the mixed doubles of the 52nd ITTF World Championships, wrestler Yun Won Chol in the men's greco-roman 55 kg category of the 2013 World Wrestling Championship and judoist Sol Kyong in the women's 78kg category of the 2013 World Judo Championship.
					
					 The DPRK players also took titles at the 14th Asian Marathon Championship, the 2013 World Youth Weightlifting Championship and the 8th Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship.
					
					 All these achievements are attributable to the energetic guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who frequently watched training and matches of sportspersons and showed warm care for the winners of international games and their coaches.
					
					 Under his careful guidance over the nation's sports development, the DPRK sportspersons will prove more successful in future international tournaments.

articles.title: Tennis Games of Officials Finish
articles.content:
Tennis Games of Officials Finish 
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Tennis games of officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions finished on Thursday. 
					 The Ministry of Chemical Industry, the General Bureau of Pleasure Park, the Academy of Social Sciences and the Mansudae Art Studio took the first place at each group.
					
					 The State Planning Commission, the State Commission of Quality Management, the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea and the External Construction Guidance Bureau took the second place and the Ministry of Light Industry, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the Foreign Languages Publishing House and the Kyonghung Guidance Bureau the third place.
					
					 The games showed the spirit and enthusiasm of officials who are taking the lead in sparking off the hot wind of sports across the country.

articles.title: Song of Yearning for Kim Jong Il Prevalent in DPRK
articles.content:
Song of Yearning for Kim Jong Il 
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the second anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise (December 17), the Korean people are ardently longing for him, singing the song "Boundless Is Our Yearning".
					 The song reflects their irresistible yearning for the leader, who devoted all his life to the wellbeing and happiness of the people and prosperity of the country.
					
					 In his lifetime Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to bring all sorts of happiness to the people.
					
					 He made a ceaseless journey of field guidance to every part of the country to defend the nation from the imperialist allied forces' isolation moves and lay solid foundations for eternal prosperity of the DPRK. Such journey continued even in rainy or snowy days and nights.
					
					 In the course he unfolded a grand plan for making a radical progress in potato cultivation and fruit farming to solve the food problem and shored up the nation's vinalon industry. And he made all possible efforts to update the industrial establishments on a CNC basis and turn the whole country into a socialist fairyland.
					
					 That is why the Korean people are earnestly singing of his ardent love, devotion and great feats for the country and the nation, with their deep yearning for him.
					
					 The song also represents their firm resolve to surely build a socialist powerful nation as desired by leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Moving to Distort History Textbooks
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Moving to Distort History Textbooks
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan recently decided to reset the standard of screening textbooks of social subjects for primary, middle and high schools. This reportedly followed the reform proposal of the Liberal Democratic Party in which it described the Nanjing massacre by the Japanese imperialists in China and sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army as unfair, and the government "viewpoint" on the historical fact of modern and contemporary history.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This proves that the Japanese conservative ruling quarters are trying to write off the already existing data, far from admitting the crimes against humanity committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 Gravity of the issue is that the moves to rewrite the textbooks are now underway neither by individual opinion nor by coercion by any force but by the order of the government, and that the conservative forces trumpeted about "respect for opinion" and "step pursuant to viewpoint" to side with it.
					
					 Japan is rushing headlong into the road for militarization and veering to the Right. It was against this backdrop that the Liberal Democratic Party and the government officials started the offensive for distorting history textbooks, an act which can not be overlooked.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are unanimously denying the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past including the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and are trying to distort history textbooks, an indication that the whole of Japan has entered the stage of advance preparation for building the state system and creating a social atmosphere for reinvasion.
					
					 Their desperate moves are aimed to make younger generation maniacs who have no guilty conscience and are obsessed by expansionism. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the shameless act of the Japanese reactionaries to evade the blame for the past crimes will add to the crimes already committed by Japan.
					
					 To make a serious apology, reflection and reparation for the crime-woven history will be beneficial to Japan.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Instructing Rewriting of Textbooks
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Instructing Rewriting of Textbooks 
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life staged actions across south Korea on Dec. 2 in protest against the puppet authorities' unreasonable instruction to rewrite textbooks.
					 On November 29, the Education Ministry authorities issued an instruction to rewrite the textbooks for senior high schools in such a way as to distort and slander the achievements made in democratic reforms in the northern half of Korea after its liberation and the advantages of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 In the textbooks they embellished the past dictatorship and shifted the blame for the division onto the north. The descriptions made by the conservative forces which passed the recent screening including the supplemented parts inciting confrontation with the north such as the "issue of human rights performance in the north" are contained in the textbooks. 
					
					 In this regard the People's Network for Nullifying Screening of Newly Written Textbooks Embellishing Pro-Japanese Acts and Dictatorship grouping the Teachers Union, the Solidarity for Implementing Justice of History and others held a press conference in Seoul.
					
					 At the conference the Network declared that the instruction given by the Ministry of Education is little short of admitting itself that the present regime is embellishing dictatorship as it was an action taken in disregard of the essence of education.
					
					 The main objective of the instruction was, in a word, to rewrite history just like the textbook produced by the conservative group, it said, branding the pressure to use the textbook which should be scrapped as a standard is as shameless an act as infusing neo-conservative idea into the students.
					
					 The organization demanded the Park Geun Hye regime retract the instruction and cancel the approval of the screening of the textbook produced by the conservative forces.
					
					 Similar protest actions took place simultaneously before the buildings of the education offices across south Korea including Pusan, Taegu, Taejon, Ulsan and North Chungchong, North Jolla, South Kyongsang and Jeju provinces on the same day.

articles.title: Apology of Chief Executive for Rigging Election Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Apology of Chief Executive for Rigging Election Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Members of the Kunsan regional branch in North Jolla Province of the Pastorate Council for Realizing Justice and Peace of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Kunsan City Office on Dec. 2 in protest against the illegal election of the south Korean ruling forces.
					 A declaration on the situation was read out at the conference.
					
					 It accused power organs of massively interfering in the past "presidential" election.
					
					 People staged candlelight demonstrations in demand of the chief executive's apology but the regime's reply was that it would "not tolerate" such actions, it recalled, adding:
					
					 This is nothing but the declaration of the second "yusin" to the people.
					
					 The present regime should look back upon how miserable fate the past dictatorial regimes met.
					
					 The declaration urged the present chief executive to make an apology to people and immediately step down as she was illegally elected.

articles.title: Nationwide Actions against Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Called for
articles.content:
Nationwide Actions against Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Called for 
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, on November 28 made public a statement "Let all of compatriots unite and blow up citadel of 'yusin' fascist dictatorship of south Korean puppet group". 
					 No sooner had the south Korean puppet group came to power than it worked hard to forcibly disband progressive political parties and organizations including the Unified Progressive Party, the Teachers Union and the Government Employees' Union to gratify its unlimited political greed after branding them as "forces following the north" and "enemy-benefiting forces" just as the "yusin" fascist dictatorial junta did, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 The frantic repressive campaign launched by the group is aimed at diverting elsewhere the public criticism of the despicable interference of power bodies in the election which helped it seize power through intrigues and eliminating all progressive and democratic forces standing in the way of the pro-U.S. unpopular ruling system and its long-term office.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the gruesome era of fascist dictatorship will return to south Korea unless such shameless and brutal fascist crackdown of the puppet group is frustrated. 
					
					 All Koreans in China together with all other compatriots at home and abroad will join hands with south Korean people of all social standings in their struggle for social progress, democracy and independent reunification and turn out as one in the sacred struggle to blow up the citadel of "yusin" dictatorship and decisively foil the moves to stamp out the progressive and democratic forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Libya
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Libya
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Tarabulus on November 28.
					 The acting secretary general of the Sunbula International Friendship Club who is chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events for praising the noble revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il between December 1 and 17.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Hanoi
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Hanoi
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Hanoi on November 28 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were figures of political parties, governments, organizations and institutions including the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Foreign Ministry, the National Assembly, the Ministry of Defence, the Ministry of Industry and Commerce, the Ministry of Public Security, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the Vietnamese Committee for Supporting Korea, the Academy of Social Sciences and the Ho Chi Minh Museum.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam said that the close relations between President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung served a solid basis of friendly relations between the two parties and countries.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung's visit to Vietnam constituted great support to the struggle of the Vietnamese people for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving its reunification.
					
					 The Communist Party of Vietnam and its government and people always remember the Korean people's support and encouragement for the struggle for the independence of the country and the building of a new society.
					
					 The Korean people are now waging a dynamic struggle for the building of a thriving nation and national reunification, the behests of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under the wise leadership of First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Communist Party, government and people of Vietnam extend invariable solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK and the Korean people on a new high stage.
					
					 Round-table talks took place at a joint agricultural corporation on Nov. 29 under the sponsorship of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bulgarian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bulgarian Political Party Leader 
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, issued a statement on November 29 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the immortal Juche idea and led the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK along the road of socialism, smashing the imperialists' moves against the DPRK.
					
					 He pursued the original Songun politics to meet the blatant challenge of the imperialists and their followers.
					
					 The Korean people has firmly defended socialism and achieved great successes in the building of a thriving nation thanks to the Songun politics.
					
					 Every visitor to the DPRK can witness successes achieved by the Korean people in building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The imperialists are now making desperate efforts to block socialist construction in the DPRK and its economic development.
					
					 But the Korean people will surely emerge victorious in reliably defending the sovereignty of the country and building an economic power under the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Guinean Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Guinean Organization
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a special bulletin on November 28 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin in its article titled "Leader always remembered by the people" said:
					
					 Two years have passed since Kim Jong Il passed away to our regret so untimely and all of a sudden.
					
					 This period was days when the people missed him so much.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche and glorified it as the guiding idea in the era of independence with his rare wisdom and energetic activities.
					
					 He, at the same time, strengthened and developed the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into an invincible party and turned the DPRK into a country of single-minded unity.
					
					 He was the greatest man who performed great exploits on behalf of the country and its people and father of the people as he dedicated himself to the people's happiness.
					
					 He will always be remembered by the Korean people and world progressive people along with prosperous socialist Korea.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Eternal general secretary of the WPK" stressed that he will always be alive along with the invincible WPK which leads the general advance of the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces Performance Given by Pyongyang Art Troupe
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces Performance Given by Pyongyang Art Troupe
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily in an article titled "Azaleas in full bloom in the city of spring" introduced a performance given by the Pyongyang Art Troupe.
					 The performance "Azalea" given by the troupe was a main program at the 13th Asian Art Festival held in Kunming in November, the article said, adding:
					
					 The Pyongyang Art Troupe provided a grand cultural event to present songs and dances with characteristics and flavor peculiar to the Korean national art to the foreign audience.
					
					 Against the background of blue sky, the dance "Fly High, Doves" was put on the stage before any others.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by dynamic rhythm of "Dance with small drum" and "Dance with Janggu (hourglass drum)."
					
					 When the song "The Flower Girl" resounded forth at the theatre, the audience responded it with enthusiastic applause.
					
					 The Pyongyang Art Troupe, regarding it as its ideal to develop the arts characterized by national spirit, has created art works strong in national flavor and sense of the times and put them on the stage.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador de Camboya
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador de Camboya 
						
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 5 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador del Reino de Camboya en Corea, Chhorn Hay, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos del rey tailandes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos del rey tailandes 
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Tailandia, Bhumibol Adulyadej, con motivo de su cumpleanos y el Dia Nacional de este pais. 
					El remitente desea al destinatario buena salud y felicidad, y al pueblo tailandes, mayor progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje a su homologo tailandes
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje a su homologo tailandes
						
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio este jueves un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo tailandes Yingluck Shinawatra con motivo del dia nacional del reino de Tailandia. 
					El remitente desea al destinatario exitos en su trabajo responsable para el incesante desarrollo y prosperidad del pais y expresa la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises. 
					
					El mismo dia, el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun tambien envio un mensaje de felicitacion al vicepremier y canciller del mismo reino, Surapong Towijakchaikul.

articles.title: Secretariado de CRPP publica la informacion no.1055
articles.content:
Secretariado de CRPP publica la informacion no.1055
						
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ahora, la lucha anti-"gubernamental" de los habitantes surcoreanos, iniciada al conocerse el crimen de la intervencion ilegal de los aparatos del poder en las pasadas elecciones presidenciales, se extiende a varios sectores como los partidos politicos, entidades y el circulo religioso.
					Las entidades sociales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las organizaciones y entidades internacionales y muchos paises del mundo envian irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha del pueblo surcoreano.
					
					Para eludir las condenas internas y externas y salir de la crisis, las autoridades titeres tratan de enganar la opinion publica describiendo el apoyo y solidaridad de la RPDC como una "intervencion en asuntos internos" del Sur de Corea.
					
					El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 5 dicha informacion condenatoria que senala en particular:
					
					La fuerte condena a las elecciones fraudulentas y la lucha por la "retirada de Park" son una expresion de la indignacion del pueblo por la banda de conservadores que robo el poder con arbitrariedades y fraudes.
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos atribuyen la lucha en su contra a la supuesta  "indicacion" y a la "propaganda contra el Sur", lo cual significa un insulto insoportable a esa lucha justa y, al mismo tiempo, una provocacion imperdonable contra la RPDC.
					
					Aunque los titeres surcoreanos hablan tanto de la "intervencion de alguien en asuntos internos", son ellos mismos los que la hacen realmente.
					
					En fin de cuentas, esa palabra no pasa de ser un embuste para justificar la purga de "fuerzas pro-Norte" y calmar el creciente clima de lucha de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					La RPDC no tolerara a la banda surcoreana, que reprime salvajemente a los luchadores por la justicia y la democracia calificandolos de "fuerzas pro-Norte", y seguira enviando el apoyo y respaldo a la justa lucha de los compatriotas surcoreanos.
					
					Antes de hablar de la inexistente "intervencion" de alguien, los titeres surcoreanos deben someterse a la sentencia de la historia como lo demandan unanimemente distintos estratos surcoreanos y la opinion publica interna y externa.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia  farsa conflictiva de banda militar de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia  farsa conflictiva de banda militar de Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la ACNC en relacion con que la banda militar titere del Sur de Corea orquesta una imperdonable farsa conflictiva insultando la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria respondio el dia 4 como sigue:
					Hace poco, la banda militar titere hizo gritar una consigna insultante a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC a los soldados titeres participantes en la ceremonia de graduacion donde fueron invitados hasta sus padres y parientes, tras terminar el entrenamiento en una unidad de ensenanza para los soldados bisonos de la Division 17 de las fuerzas terrestres.
					
					Se dice que les obliga a gritar tales consignas en los dias ordinarios inclusive antes de comer y al mover.
					
					Todo esto es una locura criminal nunca perdonable siendo otra gran provocacion contra la RPDC.
					
					Todos saben que en el pasado, la banda militar hizo colocar en los cuarteles, los puestos e instalaciones militares las consignas insultantes a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y lanzaron proyectiles y balas contra los blancos que simbolizan la maxima dignidad de esta, lo que provocaron la vehemente indignacion del ejercito y pueblo coreanos y la gran censura del interior y exterior del pais.
					
					A pesar de esto, ellos siguen recurriendo a tales farsas sin rectificar sus faltas.
					
					Tal criminalidad demuestra que ellos son titeres tan enloquecidos al enfrentamiento.
					
					Ahora, la banda de Park Geun-hye establecio hasta el "Centro de cultivo del espiritu para defensa de la patria" tomando como base la "Escuela de cultivo del espiritu de ejercito" de la epoca de la dictadura de "Yusin" a fin de sembrar entre los uniformados la hostilidad a los connacionales y el fervor de guerra.
					
					Insatisfecha con el alboroto de "purga de fuerzas pro-Norte", la banda traidora inculca la confrontacion fratricida movilizando hasta el ejercito y calumnia perversamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, lo que es un ultimo coletazo para calmar la indignacion de la opinion publica y la vacilacion  del interior del ejercito causadas por las elecciones ilicitas y el renacimiento de la dictadura fascista de "Yusin" y salir de la crisis y justificar la confrontacion y sus maniobras belicas.
					
					Es ridiculo que la banda de Park hable de la "confianza" y la "cumbre N-S" censurando atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, considerada como vida por el ejercito y pueblo coreanos.
					
					Ella tiene la calificacion de hablar del "cese  de censuras y difamacion a lider estatal?
					
					Como ya hemos advertido, no toleraremos a quienes ofendan la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y les eliminaremos sin piedad.
					
					La banda de Park debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que tales maniobras pagaran muy caro.

articles.title: Agregado militar de Cuba ofrece banquete por dia de las FAR
articles.content:
Agregado militar de Cuba ofrece banquete por dia de las FAR
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 57o aniversario del Dia de las Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias de Cuba, el agregado militar de la Embabaja de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, Juan Miguel Garcia Montano, ofrecio el dia 5 un banquete en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang. 
					Fueron invitados a la recepcion generales y oficiales del Ejercito Popular de Corea, funcionarios correspondientes, representantes diplomaticos y agregados militares de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada cubana.
